version_description: Fixed a bug which caused playback to stop for some users.
This build displays better error messages if there was a problem logging in, rather than just telling you to check your internet connection.

We've listened to all your feedback and rebuilt Mixcloud from scratch to be faster and more intuitive. The app now features a brand new user interface, playlist support, sharing of profiles, blocking users, spam reporting and of course full support for iO

Unfortunately we weren't as quick on buying the iPhone 7, and missed a crash which only affects users on the device when they open the full player. This is now fixed. We've also brought back followers and following. Thanks for your continued support! :)
Deep linking now works again, even if the  app wasn't in the background when linking into the app. Also squashed a few minor bugs.
Bumped the versions of some libraries with in the app. Also fixed deep linking from emails.
Contains a fix for a crash that sometimes occurs during audio streaming.
Fixes a bug which stopped some users from being able to enable Push Notifications.
Squashed a few nasty bugs. Fixed a few minor playback issues.

> Fixed a bug which sometimes caused the app to crash when scrolling the feed.
> Carplay bug fixed which caused it be stuck in the loading state.
> Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

> Upgraded player streaming technology for speed and performance improvements.
> Chromecast updates
> Bug Fixes

> Upgraded player streaming technology for speed and performance improvements.
> Chromecast updates
> Bug Fixes

> Upgraded player streaming technology for speed and performance improvements.
> Chromecast updates
> Fix a bug which sometimes shares the wrong url
> Other Bug Fixes

> Fixes to deep links from email or Facebook
> Fixes to Sonos integration
> Fix a bug when deep linking into the app.
Squashed a few nasty bugs. Thanks for your continued support of Mixcloud :).
Squashed a few nasty bugs. Thanks for your continued support of Mixcloud :).

> Fix a bug which affects some users logging in
> Performance improvements
> General bug fixes.

• Optimization for iOS13
• Due to the iOS13 update, a bluetooth request was appearing in the app. This has been removed
• Improvements to app stability

• Optimization for iOS13
• Due to the iOS13 update, a bluetooth request was appearing in the app. This has been removed
• Improvements to app stability
• We've fixed some issues that could occur when opening Mixcloud from links in other Apps
• We've improved playback stability. Less buffering!
Fixes a crash on playback that has affected some users.

• We’ve redesigned our login and signup flows, fixing lots of small issues
• You can now reset your password or recover your account from the mobile app
• We noticed that some web links weren’t opening in the app, this has been fixed

Support for the iPhone X display :).
> Added support for iOS 9.
> Fixed a crash which affects users on iOS9.
> Fixed a crash that affects some users on log in.

> Fixed a crash that affects some users when logging in with Facebook.
> Carplay is working again!
Bug fixes and performances improvements.
> Bug fixes and performance improvements.

> Preparation for exciting new features coming soon!
> Bug fixes and stability improvements.
Bug fixes and stability improvements.
We've spent a lot of time focusing on playback performance and decrease lag. This build also contains some minor bug fixes.

> Fixed a bug affecting CarPlay users
> Other bug fixes and performance improvements.
At Mixcloud we are always working to improve the user experience. We will be pushing out regular updates with performance and stability improvements.

> Chromecast has been given some love. Apologies to the users experiencing problems with this.
> Tracklists.
> Performance and stability improvements across the app.
At Mixcloud we are always working to improve the user experience. We will be pushing out regular updates with performance and stability improvements.

• We’ve redesigned our login and signup flows, fixing lots of small issues
• You can now reset your password or recover your account from the mobile app
• We noticed that some web links weren’t opening in the app, this has been fixed
• We’ve list

The first of many upcoming improvements to the Mixcloud app.

First up, an improved navigation system:

- A more streamlined Feed.
- A Library tab to access your favourite shows.
- A Browse tab for faster discovery.
- A Select tab to

The first of many upcoming improvements to the Mixcloud app.

First up, an improved navigation system:

- A more streamlined Feed.
- A Library tab to access your favourite shows.
- A Browse tab for faster discovery.
- A Select tab to

In this version we addressed the following:
- Several bugs regarding Premium and Select subscribers not having access to tracklists
- Crash fixes through the app
- Fix for a blank screen on certain countries on the Player

Mixcloud is 10!

To mark the occasion, we’re introducing you, our community, to an entirely new brand that better represents the passion and vibrancy that you bring to the platform everyday.

Beyond our fresh new look (bye bye, cloud) we’re ma
Along with our new rebrand and UI updates, we've fixed issues with offline playback.

Watch Live streams using your Mixcloud app!
- You can now watch live streams by your favourite DJs by clicking on the new broadcast icon in the tab navigation

What’s new in version 26.2.0:

This is just a preparatory release for improvements to Push Notifications. You shouldn't see any changes yet, but soon we will be sending Push Notifications when users you follow start a Live stream. Notifications will

What’s new in version 26.2.3:

Don’t miss out on being notified when your favourite creators start a live stream. Turn on Push Notifications in the App Settings so you know when the stream has started and click the notification to watch it live.
